name: Conveyor Chaos
description:
STORY

You are participating in an annual competition at the warehouse where you work. You must leap and duck under the various items on the conveyor belt until you are knocked off. Make sure to pick up any screws you find laying around, as they can give you various boosts!

CREDITS

This game was made as part of the CS394 Course at DeSales University. Credits go the following students:

Lucas Acosta-Morales: Level Design and Programming

Robert Young: Art Design

Alex Drozdowski: Interface and Sound Design
